channel.title: Server Up-time Help
channel.description:
I've looked everywhere for an appropriate place to post this in but there doesn't seem to be one, FORGIVE ME if I'm wrong but I couldn't see this being posted anywhere else.
My servers up-time percentage seems to have not changed at all for weeks now, I've watched it carefully and it never changes. It still says 97% yet it's online 24/7, I've waited over a month for it to change now and it hasn't. Can a staff member please tell me what's up or what's wrong or something because I believe it should say 100% and I can't figure out why.
Regards, Simplicity
(Server is "Simplicity 562")

item.title: Server Up-time Help
item.dc:creator: @Simplicity Simplicity
item.description:
@Simplicity wrote:

I don’t really want to make a new account or feel the need to, it also may not be allowed. I was hoping I could please get a staff member to maybe asses the situation for me please?

Thanks,
Simplicity

Read full topic

item.title: Server Up-time Help
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

Trxkin:

Id make a new Acc and post it again. With a different ip.

I believe you are only allowed on MoparScape forums account?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Up-time Help
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

you server will never be 100%, resets take it off that, etc.

Read full topic
